title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository with CLI, REST API, and Go library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’ with 200k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI; supports sync/async, streaming, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; packaged as Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central; supports streaming, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with simple API surface and streaming support.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Community repo collecting ready-to-use Ollama tool schemas (function-calling examples).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function calling, and deployment patterns.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that consumes the Ollama REST API, published on npm.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes Ollama endpoints with rate-limiting and OpenAI-compatible routes.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and run Ollama models during Java/Kotlin build or test phases.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest; published on crates.io as ollama-rs.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package (pub.dev: ollama) for integrating local LLMs into mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that routes user prompts to Ollama with per-user model selection and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.
